queryParams.name: user
queryParams.validValues: UUID based user id of the user
queryParams.multipleOccurrence: Not supported, only one will be picked up

queryParams.name: subject
queryParams.validValues: As provided by subject list API
queryParams.multipleOccurrence: Not supported, only one will be picked up
queryParams.comment: Provides a filter for subject for which competency matrix needs to be generated

response.comment: Status values ranges from 0 10 5. O means not started, 1 means progress, 2 means inferred, 3 means in asserted, 4 means completed, 5 means mastered
